Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - ReviewCoordinators
Workflow.Description: The flow adds newly added Coordinators to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Coordinators not having access to carry out administrative tasks on the system.

LocalizedName.description: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - ReviewCoordinators

Description.description: The flow adds newly added Coordinators to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Coordinators not having access to carry out administrative tasks on the system.
